game

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Character, Projectile

    public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents all moving objects in the game that are displayed as images. A sprite can move according to its velocity and acceleration vectors, and can collide with other sprites, based on its hitboxMode. hitboxMode determines if the sprite is treated as a rectangle or circle when colliding with other sprites. Basically the superclass for most of the other objects
    Author:
    epedley885

      Draws this sprite on drawer
      float getHeight() 
      float getWidth() 
      void handleTileCollisions(Sprite tile)
      Makes this sprite not move inside another sprite, as long as tile's hitbox is a rectangle and is axis-aligned(edges are parallel to x or y axes) and this sprite's hitbox is a circle moves the sprite out of tile if it is in it.
      boolean intersects(Sprite other)
      Checks to see if this sprite is intersecting another sprite
      void scale(float scaleFactor)
      Makes the width and height of this sprite smaller/larger by multiplying both of them by scaleFactor
      void updatePos(Level l)
      Makes the sprite move based on its velocity and changed the velocity based on the acceleration

      • handleTileCollisions

        public void handleTileCollisions(Sprite tile)
        Makes this sprite not move inside another sprite, as long as tile's hitbox is a rectangle and is axis-aligned(edges are parallel to x or y axes) and this sprite's hitbox is a circle moves the sprite out of tile if it is in it.
        Parameters:
        tile - hitboxMode has to be 0 and angle must be an integer multiple of PI/2
        debugger -
